original: These legendary boots increase the Carrying Capacity of the wearer by 30 lb as well as conferring a +1 bonus to their Fortitude
translate: These legendary boots increase the Carrying Capacity of the wearer by 30lb as well as conferring a +1 bonus to their Fortitude

original: This helmet increases the user’s Awareness and Spell Aptitude by +1
translate: This helmet increases the user’s Awareness and Spell Aptitude by +2

original: It is quite stylish but offers little protection
translate: It is quite stylish hat worn by fops that offers little protection

original: Press 'T' to equip it whilst exploring
translate: Press 'T' to equip it whilst exploring

original: You lose a few each time you pick a lock so take care to gather a supply
translate: They tend to break in locks when picking them, so having a reserve supply might be worthwhile

original: In the right hands it could be used as a weapon
translate: In the right hands, it could be used as a weapon

original: A hand-drawn map depicting the sewers underneath Horryn
translate: A hand-drawn map depicting the sewers underneath Horryn

original: Used for digging in the ground!
translate: Used for digging in the ground!

original: The first time you take Wound Damage each combat, you automatically regain 30-40 Vitality Hit Points
translate: The first time you take Wound Damage each combat, you instantly regenerate 30-40 Vitality Hit Points

original: The journal contains a large amount of tabulated data that appears to be astrological in nature interspersed with notes
translate: The journal contains a large amount of tabulated data, interspersed with notes, that appears to be astrological in nature

original: The final entries appear to have been made only days before your arrival
translate: The final entries appear to have been shortly before your arrival, only days prior

original: Observed strange dancing lights in the sky
translate: Observed strange dancing lights in the sky

original: Not unlike those sailors to the far south describe near polar regions yet somehow different
translate: Not unlike those which sailors state witnessing to the far south, near the polar regions, yet somehow, these are different

original: For a fleeting moment I even thought I heard a sound
translate: For a fleeting moment, I even thought I heard a sound

original: Somewhere between a deep wail and singing
translate: Somewhere between a deep wail and singing

original: Charts or instruments are off and I cannot make sense of the sky
translate: Charts or instruments are off, and I cannot make sense of the sky

original: Bodies that are alien to me
translate: Bodies that are alien to me

original: It must be some form of comet storm or some other extraordinary astronomical event that has not been predicted in the Imperial Charts
translate: It must be a comet storm of sorts, or some other extraordinary astronomical event that has not been predicted in the Imperial Charts

original: I have done the calculations over and over and I come to the same conclusion
translate: I have double-checked the calculations repeatedly and  still come to the same conclusion

original: The stars are wrong - in so many ways!
translate: The stars are wrong - in so many ways!

original: As I observed an alien cluster in the southeastern quadrant, it dawned on me with absolute certainty
translate: As I observed an alien cluster in the southeastern quadrant, it dawned on me with absolute certainty

original: I am not watching them - they are watching me
translate: I am not watching them - they are watching me

original: I dread to look again yet I feel compelled to do so
translate: I dread to look again, yet I feel compelled to do so

original: I am certain that if I look again into that dreadful cluster in the southeastern quadrant I shall be undone
translate: I am certain that if I peer once more into that dreadful, southeastern cluster I shall be undone

original: Deeper and more profound than any mortal mind can comprehend
translate: Deeper and more profound than any mortal mind can comprehend

original: I believe I shall look again
translate: I believe I shall look again

original: A small, generic book of lore
translate: A small, generic book of folklore

original: Fawlon’s Treatise on the Origins of Imperial Fauna Excerpt
translate: Fawlon’s Treatise on the Origins of Imperial Fauna Excerpt
Records state the battle of Diagolo pass raged for 3 days, and when it was over, more lives had been lost than saved

original: It was a time of great sorrow, but from this calamity, new life blossomed
translate: It was a time of great sorrow, but from this calamity, new life blossomed

original: For from the soil beneath which the lost legions lay an abundance of crimson red flowers sprouted forth
translate: For from the soil beneath which the lost legions lay an abundance of crimson red flowers sprouted forth

original: Flowers that, it is said, will only grow upon the graves of those fallen in battle
translate: Flowers that, it is said, will only grow upon the graves of those fallen in battle

original: To the river I will go,
translate: To the river I shall go,

original: To soothe a heart that’s full of woe,
translate: To soothe this heart full of woe.

original: For in the water’s cool embrace
translate: For in the water's cool embrace,

original: My true self I will face
translate: There I shall find my true face.

original: When we have sown our fields
translate: When we have sown our fields

original: For context and comaprison, I have taken the opportunity of adding the transcript of a fruit farmer's tirade to the local magistrate on the issue of the potatoe-related agricultural reforms
translate: For context and comparison, I have taken the opportunity of adding the transcript of a fruit farmer's tirade to the local magistrate on the issue of the potato related agricultural reforms

original: If I receive one more decree commanding me to re-sow my fruit orchards into bloody potato fields!
translate: If I receive one more decree commanding me to re-sow my fruit orchards into bloody potato fields!

original: I’m going to send him a bag full of my ripest manure!
translate: I’m going to send him a bag full of my ripest manure!

original: Bloody Magi, making a mess of the world and leaving it to us lot to clean it up!
translate: Bloody Magi, making a mess of the world and leaving it to us lot to clean it up!

original: They can shove their bloody seed-potatoes up their sacred arses for all I bleeding care!
translate: They can shove their bloody seed-potatoes up their sacred arses for all I bleeding care!

original: In the year of 641 GA, after the lay-Countess of Vaul lost her firstborn to dry lung, it is rumored that she locked herself up in her chambers to wallow in her grief
translate: In 641 GA the lay-Countess of Vaul lost her firstborn to dry lung, and was rumoured to have locked herself in her chambers to wallow in grief

original: One of the lay-Countess's most important offices was as head of the High Forum, and thus, fearing her absence would cause much unrest amongst nobility, the countess’ majordomo sought help from a wise old crone
translate: An important office of hers was as head of the High Forum, and thus, fearing her absence would cause unrest amongst nobility, the countess's majordomo sought help from a wise old crone

original: After hearing her plea, the crone handed the countess’ majordomo a single, violet coloured flower
translate: After hearing her plea, the crone handed the majordomo a single, violet coloured flower

original: Place this beside her bed, and to it all her sorrow shall be fed
translate: Place this beside her bed, and to it all her sorrow shall be fed

original: Desperate, the countess’ majordomo did as the crone advised, and less than a tide later, the lay-Countess of Vaul left her chambers for the first time since the loss of her child
translate: Desperate, the countess’s majordomo did as the crone advised, and less than a tide later, the lay-Countess of Vaul left her chambers for the first time since the loss of her child

original: The tale was quickly passed between courtiers, and ever since, the fauna - aptly named ‘Sorroweater’ - has been given as a gift in times of great sorrow
translate: The tale was quickly passed between courtiers, and ever since, the fauna - aptly named ‘Sorroweater’ - has been given as a gift in times of great sorrow

original: The High Forum of 641 was indeed a great success
translate: The High Forum of 641 was indeed a great success

original: As so often when the lay-nobility conveens, much was discussed, little was decided and nothing was accomplished save gluttony, fornication and a stabbing or two
translate: As so often when the lay-nobility conveens, much was discussed, little was decided and nothing was accomplished save gluttony, fornication and a stabbing or two

original: Despite its beautiful appearance, the legend on the origin of the Starflower is a grim one
translate: Despite its beautiful appearance, the legend on the origin of the Starflower is a grim one

original: Many centuries ago, before Gallina came from the south, a fatally wounded warrior lay dying
translate: Many centuries ago, before Gallina came from the south, a fatally wounded warrior lay dying

original: He pleaded to the Gods for help just as a shooting star passed through the sky
translate: He pleaded to the Gods for help just as a shooting star passed through the sky

original: Hearing his cries and taking pity on the young man, the star descended to earth to answer his prayers
translate: Hearing his cries and taking pity on the young man, the star descended to earth to answer his prayers

original: At first the soldier was grateful, but he became smitten by her beauty and soon grew lustful
translate: At first the soldier was grateful, but he became smitten by her beauty and soon grew lustful

original: Then possessive and finally cruel towards the stellar being
translate: Then possessive, and finally cruel towards the stellar being

original: She refused him, claiming that stars belong to all who love them and the soldier went mad with rage
translate: She refused him, claiming that stars belong to all who love them; upon hearing this, the soldier flew into a mad rage

original: He strangled her then and there for if he could not have her, no one would
translate: He strangled her there and then, for if he could not have her, no one would

original: As the star’s last breath left her, her Sisters began to weep
translate: As the star’s last breath left her, her sisters began to weep

original: In a shower of burning light, their tears fell to the earth where the star lay, immolating the man who had killed her
translate: In a shower of burning light, their tears fell to the earth where the star lay, immolating the man who had killed her

original: When dawn finally broke and the stars withdrew, all that was left in their wake was a field of star-shaped flowers
translate: When dawn finally broke and the stars withdrew, leaving their rosy-fingered streaks in the sky, all that remained upon Warda was a field of star-shaped flowers

original: This bright fauna was first discovered in the province of Gorremia following one of the worst winters in the region’s history
translate: This bright fauna was first discovered in the province of Gorremia following one of the most bitter winters in the region’s history

original: It is reported that after months of unrelenting snow and ice, the land in this region had become so barren the locals worried new life would never grow from it again
translate: It is reported that after months of unrelenting snow and ice, the land in this region had become so barren the locals feared new life would never sprout anew

original: Fearing the worst, a handful of villagers decided to seek out new homes, and set out with heavy hearts to begin the long journey to the temperate Heartlands
translate: Fearing the worst, a handful of villagers decided to seek out new homes, and set out with heavy hearts to begin the long journey to the temperate Heartlands

original: It was at this moment, as the villagers braced themselves to leave their lives behind, that a single ray of sunlight broke through the clouds to light the barren area before them
translate: It was at this moment, as the villagers braced themselves to leave their lives behind, that a single ray of sunlight broke through the clouds to light the barren area before them

original: Breaths held, the villagers watched as that sliver of sunlight thawed the icy ground, unveiling the beginnings of a single, yellow bud
translate: Breaths held, the villagers watched as that sliver of sunlight thawed the icy ground, unveiling the beginnings of a single, yellow bud

original: A bud that, to this day, has only ever been found to grow in areas of direct sunlight
translate: A bud that, to this day, has only ever been found to grow in areas of direct sunlight

original: We’re working long hours into the night to deal with the recent influx of corpses
translate: We’re working long hours into the night to deal with the recent influx of corpses

original: What compels these people to act so cruelly?
translate: What compels these people to act so cruelly?

original: Yesterday we had the corpse of a young boy of no more than 12 years come in
translate: Yesterday we had the corpse of a young boy of no more than 12 years come in

original: He had been beaten to death by the looks of it
translate: He had been beaten to death by the looks of it

original: Sacred dead preserve me - were it not for the calling, I’m not sure I would have persevered
translate: Sacred dead preserve me - were it not for the calling, I’m not sure I would have persevered

original: Brother Aruun came running up from the crypt, so frightened he had pissed his robes
translate: Brother Aruun came running up from the crypt, so frightened he had pissed his robes

original: He claimed he saw something move down in the crypt
translate: He claimed he saw something move down in the crypt

original: We laughed till we fell over and by the end, so did he
translate: We laughed till we fell over and by the end, so did he

original: No doubt he saw one of the rats but it’s funny where the mind wanders when sleep becomes scarce
translate: No doubt he saw one of the rats, but it’s funny where the mind wanders when sleep becomes scarce

original: Something is wrong in the village!
translate: Something is wrong in the village!

original: They say some kind of riot has broken out
translate: They say some kind of riot has broken out

original: Hierophant Leios said Driina has gone to investigate and that we monks should stay in the crypt for our own safety
translate: Hierophant Leios said Driina has gone to investigate, and that we monks should stay in the crypt for our own safety

original: We try to pass the time with work but I wish we knew what was happening
translate: We try to pass the time with work, but I wish we knew what was happening

original: They came from the lower crypts!
translate: They came from the lower crypts!

original: All are dead save me and brother Aruun!
translate: All are dead, save me and brother Aruun!

original: We have locked ourselves in the storage room
translate: We have locked ourselves in the storage room

original: There is no light in the afterlife!
translate: There is no light in the afterlife!

original: I dare not leave this room - I hear them outside
translate: I dare not leave this room - I hear them outside

original: A ragged letter that seems to contain direction of some sort
translate: A ragged letter that seems to contain direction of some sort

original: Enter the sewers from the harbor through the westernmost outlet
translate: Enter the sewers from the harbour through the westernmost outlet

original: Follow the chalk arrows on the wall and make your way east past the central cistern and then south
translate: Follow the chalk arrows on the wall, and make your way east past the central cistern, and then south

original: From there you’ll find a stairs going down and into the Rat-Maze
translate: From there you’ll find stair going down and into the Rat Maze

original: In the maze, go W, S, S, W, W and you’ll find yourself in the Underhalls
translate: In the maze, go W, S, S, W, W and you’ll find yourself in the Underhalls

original: Mind your manners while you’re there and be sure to peruse the Black Market
translate: Mind your manners while you’re there, and be sure to peruse the Black Market

original: A journal that was kept by the ship surgeon of the Zephyr
translate: A journal that was kept by the ship surgeon of the Zephyr

original: Written on the day of departure from the mainland
translate: Written on the day of departure from the mainland

original: Left Adler's Helm today with a full complement of passengers
translate: Left Adler's Helm today with a full complement of passengers

original: Mercenaries by the looks of it
translate: Mercenaries, by the looks of it

original: Ship was dispatched by Guild before we could fully restock medical supplies
translate: Ship was dispatched by the Guild before we could fully restock medical supplies

original: Then again, our passengers make me uneasy
translate: Then again, our passengers make me uneasy

original: Brawl in mess - had to set nose
translate: Brawl in the mess - had to set a nose

original: Have been sleeping poorly and dreams are... unsound
translate: Many have been sleeping poorly and having dreams that are... unsound

original: Igan came to me today with a bite-wound that he sustained whilst working in the hold
translate: Igan came to me today with a bite-wound that he sustained whilst working in the hold

original: Didn't see creature and I would say it was a rat's bite if it weren't for the size and some aspect of the dentition that I find hard to explain properly
translate: Didn't see creature; I would say it was a rat's bite if it weren't for the size and some aspect of the dentition that I find hard to explain properly

original: Was visited today by navigator Aslam
translate: Was visited today by navigator Aslam

original: He asked for Whitefern - a sedative
translate: He asked for Whitefern - a sedative

original: Suspected he was not fully forthcoming and when pushed, he mumbled something about the stars being 'odd'
translate: Suspected he was not fully forthcoming and when pushed, he mumbled something about the stars being 'odd'

original: Not sure what he meant and he left before I could push him further
translate: Not sure what he meant and he left before I could push him further

original: We cannot maintain our course for Idra
translate: We cannot maintain our course for Idra

original: Captain advised me today to make ready the surgery and to expect casualties
translate: Captain advised me today to make ready the surgery and to expect casualties

original: I suspect he intends to inform our passengers that he refuses to land on the island
translate: I suspect he intends to inform our passengers that he refuses to land on the island

original: A small, leather-bound journal filled with neat handwritten notes
translate: A small, leather-bound journal filled with neat handwritten notes

original: Noted on the inside cover is the name “Caspar of Loral
translate: Noted on the inside cover is the name “Caspar of Loral

original: Arrived today and was met by the man who is to be my overseer
translate: Arrived today and was met by the man who is to be my overseer

original: He seemed nice enough albeit eccentric
translate: He seemed nice enough, albeit eccentric

original: Is this to be my fate as well?
translate: Is this to be my fate as well?

original: Woe to me that my wretched life and poor choices has landed me, Caspar of Loral, on this barren rock as the keeper of lights
translate: Woe to me that my wretched life and poor choices has landed me, Caspar of Loral, on this barren rock as Keeper of the Lights

original: Saw lights on the shore near the cave entrance
translate: Saw lights on the shore near the cave entrance

original: He insists we leave them alone and I am forced to abide, though my mind wanders often to that cave and what may lay within
translate: He insists we leave them alone and I am forced to abide, though my mind wanders often to that cave and what may lay within

original: I cannot take it any more!
The old bastard is driving me mad!
translate: The old bastard is driving me mad!

original: He spies on me and gives me strange looks
translate: He spies on me and gives me strange looks

original: And I’m sure he goes through my things!
translate: And I’m sure he goes through my things!

original: I went for a walk to clear my head and I ended up by the entrance to the sea-cave
translate: I went for a walk to clear my head and I ended up by the entrance to the sea-cave

original: I hear it even in my sleep
translate: I hear it even in my sleep

original: About a week before your arrival in Idra
translate: About a week before your arrival in Idra

original: Always it calls me to the caves
translate: Always it calls me to the caves

original: To the deeper dark that lies beneath where no man has tread for eons
translate: To the deeper dark that lies beneath, where no man has tread for eons

original: The looking stone and the ancient sleepers
translate: The looking stone and the ancient sleepers

original: Dropped off and told to guard the cargo until it can be collected
translate: dropped off and told to guard the cargo until it can be collected

original: And whilst the bastards up in the northern cave are living the good life I’m stuck in this hole
translate: And whilst the bastards up in the northern cave are living the good life, I’m stuck in this hole

original: I sometimes think the Imperial dungeons would be preferable
translate: I sometimes think the Imperial dungeons would be preferable

original: We explored the cave today and found what appears to be an underwater tunnel in one of the dead-ends
translate: We explored the cave today and found what appears to be an underwater tunnel in one of the dead ends

original: Bryn insisted we try to swim it but I can think of no worse nightmare than being lost in the dark underwater
translate: Bryn insisted we try to swim it, but I can think of no worse nightmare than being lost in the dark, underwater

original: I told him as much and he got agitated
translate: I told him as much and he got agitated

original: Yelled something about dreaming of an ancient relic
translate: Yelled something about dreaming of an ancient relic

original: I have no idea what he’s on about
translate: I have no idea what he’s on about

original: Bryn got attacked by a crab the size of a warhound today!
translate: Bryn got attacked by a crab the size of a warhound today!

original: Neither of us have seen anything like it before and we can only pray it was alone!
translate: Neither of us have seen anything like it before and we can only pray it was alone!

original: Hope the ship won't be delayed much longer
translate: Hope the ship won't be delayed much longer

original: I know in my heart he’s gone to the underwater tunnel
translate: I know in my heart he’s gone to the underwater tunnel

original: Shapes are moving in the dark now
translate: Shapes are moving in the dark now

original: No way out and no one is coming for me!
translate: No way out and no one is coming for me!

original: All of the above can be found growing in our field
translate: All of the above can be found growing in our field

original: Sea bird eggs will do just fine
translate: Sea bird eggs will do just fine

original: A journal that appears to have been written by one of the members of the Cabal expedition
translate: A journal that appears to have been written by one of the members of the Cabal expedition

original: This one was found in the base-camp
translate: This one was found in the base-camp

original: We’ve finally arrived at the Priory and found it in shockingly good condition
translate: We’ve finally arrived at the priory and found it in shockingly good condition

original: It’s as if time has stood still here
translate: It’s as if time has stood still here

original: The initial survey does not reveal a clear means of accessing the lower level but I’m confident we’ll find a way given enough time
translate: The initial survey does not reveal a clear means of accessing the lower level, but I’m confident we’ll find a way given enough time

original: It appears to stand as it was left millennia ago
translate: It appears to stand as it was left millennia ago

original: How it could have slipped so well out of time and history is truly a mystery to me
translate: How it could have slipped so well out of time and history is truly a mystery to me

original: As is the fate of the Priory’s original occupants
translate: As is the fate of the priory’s original occupants

original: Still no success in finding the door to the catacombs
translate: Still no success in finding the door to the catacombs

original: I can only conclude it’s somehow concealed
translate: I can only conclude it’s somehow concealed

original: We did, however, make an interesting discovery
translate: We did, however, make an interesting discovery

original: The four statues on the “pilgrim’s road” can be rotated
translate: The four statues on the “pilgrim’s road” can be rotated

original: I’m certain this is somehow significant!
translate: I’m certain this is somehow significant!

original: Some form of disease is spreading amongst the men
translate: Some form of disease is spreading amongst the men

original: Abdominal pain and swelling combined with fevers
translate: Abdominal pain and swelling, combined with fevers

original: Our apothecary is so far at a loss at curing it but suggests that proximity to the fungal growths that started sprouting is a potential vector of infection
translate: Our apothecary is so far at a loss at curing it, but suggests that proximity to the fungal growths that started sprouting is a potential vector of infection

original: I’ve ordered that masks be worn near the growths
translate: I’ve ordered that masks be worn near the growths

original: We found a document in the scriptorium with a verse on it!
translate: we found a document in the scriptorium with a verse on it!

original: The portal had been hidden in plain sight all along - all it took to open it was the correct configuration of the statues!
translate: The portal had been hidden in plain sight all along - all it took to open it was the correct configuration of the statues!

original: A journal that appears to have been written by one of the members of the Cabal expedition that was dispatched to the Priory
translate: A journal that appears to have been written by one of the members of the Cabal expedition that was dispatched to the Priory

original: This one was found on a cocooned corpse in the catacombs
translate: This one was found on a cocooned corpse in the catacombs

original: I’m awestruck by the mystery of it all
translate: I’m awestruck by the mystery of it all

original: What secrets did the Sleeper whisper to the monks as they dreamed?
translate: What secrets did the Sleeper whisper to the monks as they dreamed?

original: We must push on and soon enough we too shall stand before his timeless glory
translate: We must push on and soon enough, we too shall stand before his timeless glory

original: By the Maiden’s, we found it!
translate: By the Maidens, we found it!

original: The tomb in all its glory
translate: The tomb in all its glory

original: We lost two members to traps trying to enter the room but it’s only a matter of time now
translate: We lost two members to traps trying to enter the room, but it’s only a matter of time now

original: I know there is something here - calling for us!
translate: I know there is something here - calling for us!

original: There must be some other way?
translate: There must be some other way?

original: Several pages are ruined from the fungal infection
translate: Several pages are ruined from the fungal infection

original: to move in and out of the caves and continue excavating the Eternity Gate
translate: to move in and out of the caves and continue excavating the Eternity Gate

original: My greatest concern at this point is the rate at which we are losing crew to suicides and infection
translate: My greatest concern at this point is the rate at which we are losing crew to suicides and infection

original: I saw them change before my very eyes!
translate: I saw them change before my very eyes!

original: Oh, blessed Maidens I may have escaped for now but I cannot escape the images that now haunt me
translate: Oh, blessed Maidens; I may have escaped for now, but I cannot escape the images that now haunt me

original: What’s worse, the entire complex is somehow resealing itself and I’m trapped between the false tomb and the surface level
translate: What’s worse, the entire complex is somehow resealing itself, and I’m trapped between the false tomb and the surface level

original: I can only pray someone is left alive topside to open the gate
translate: I can only pray someone is left alive topside to open the gate

original: This one was found on a corpse in the catacombs
translate: This one was found on a corpse in the catacombs

original: They’ve found the secret passage to some kind of cave below the false tomb
translate: They’ve found the secret passage to some kind of cave below the false tomb

original: Something far older than the Priory itself
translate: Something far older than the Black Priory itself

original: Older than the Empire even is the talk around camp
translate: Older than the Empire even, is the talk around camp

original: I just wish my insides didn’t hurt as much
translate: I just wish my insides didn’t hurt as much

original: They’re sending me down with the next shipment of tools
translate: They’re sending me down with the next shipment of tools

original: They say it can’t be lit even by magical lighting
translate: They say it can’t be lit, even by magical lighting

original: Apparently it’s easy enough to navigate if you know how
translate: Apparently, it’s easy enough to navigate if you know how

original: South until you hit the first wall and then west until wall - north until wall - west until wall - north until wall - west until wall - then north and you’re there
translate: South, until you hit the first wall; and then west, until wall; north, until wall; west, until wall; north, until wall; west, until wall - then north; and you’re there

original: I went all the way to the sanctum this time
translate: I went all the way to the sanctum this time

original: By the Golden how I wish I had not
translate: By the Golden, how I wish I had not

original: How can such a thing be?
translate: How can such a thing be?

original: Rough but functional woolen clothing that serves the hard-working commoners of the empire well
translate: Rough but functional woolen clothing that serves the hard-working commoners of the empire well

original: Well suited for travel and adventuring if you can learn to live with the itching
translate: Well suited for travel and adventuring; if you can learn to live with the itching

original: A bottle of strong Gorremian brandy
translate: A bottle of strong Gorremian brandy

original: The tired old mercenary's best friend
translate: Best friend to the tired old mercenary

original: Sparkling and sweet, this cider comes from the slow-growing orchards of Firgol
translate: Sparkling and sweet, this cider comes from the slow-growing orchards of Firgol

original: Many claim it’s the best in all of the Northern Empire whilst a handful of bad apples will complain it’s too sweet
translate: Many claim it’s the best in all of the Northern Empire, whilst a handful of bad apples will complain it's excessively sweet

original: A sweet alcoholic brew made from honey
translate: A sweet alcoholic brew made from honey

original: Widely enjoyed in all of the Northern Empire and the Outer Isles
translate: Widely enjoyed in all of the Northern Empire and the Outer Isles

original: Whilst its ability to keep the medicae away has yet to be proven, this common fruit can be found growing on trees in the summer months and is a staple in the pantry of peasants and noblemen alike
translate: Whilst its ability to keep the medicae away has yet to be proven, this common fruit can be found growing on trees in the summer months and is a staple in the pantry of peasants and noblemen alike

original: There is truly no better way to start the day than with a fresh chunk of this salted pork
translate: There is truly no better way to start the day than with a fresh chunk of this salted pork

original: A piece of the traditional dark and heavy full-grain bread that is eaten throughout the region by farmers and laborers
translate: A piece of the traditional dark and heavy full-grain bread that is eaten throughout the region by farmers and labourers

original: Due to its affordability, the rich and creamy, salted butter from Heartlander cows is a popular source of nourishment amongst the lower classes of the Empire
translate: Due to its affordability, the rich and creamy salted butter from Heartlander cows is a popular source of nourishment amongst the lower classes of the Empire

original: Abundant and healthy, carrots are a staple in the soups and stews of the north
translate: Abundant and healthy, carrots are a staple in the various soups and stews of the north

original: Also, Hospitallers claim they improve your night-sight

original: Perfect for eating with bread and ham
translate: Perfect for eating with bread and ham

original: As inexpensive and filling as it is smelly

original: Sheep's milk cheese is a staple in the northern Hinterlands
translate: Sheep's milk cheese is a staple in the northern Hinterlands

translate: Many of the Empire’s citizens will pay a pretty penny to get their hands on this soft, sweet meat

original: Boiled in salted water and served on white bread with melted butter and squeezed lemon, crab-meat is truly a feast
translate: Boiled in salted water and served on white bread with melted butter and squeezed lemon, crab-meat is truly a delight
Rich and creamy. But not butter

original: Don’t let the cat have it
translate: Don’t let the cat have it

original: A favorite amongst adventures, this smoky, preserved meat can last longer than most people’s lives
translate: A favourite amongst adventures, this smoky, preserved meat can last longer than most people’s lives

original: Due to their abundance in both rivers and oceans, eels are one of the most popular seafoods in the Empire
translate: Due to their abundance in both rivers and oceans, eels are one of the most popular seafoods in the Empire

original: So popular, in fact, that some citizens have even been known to accept them as payment
translate: So popular, in fact, that some citizens have even been known to accept them as payment

original: Don't put them all in one basket
translate: Don't put them all in one basket

original: The humble perklin makes up for its meager size with its abundance
translate: The humble perklin makes up for its meager size with its abundance

original: It's often perserved with salt and eaten year round
translate: It's often preserved with salt and eaten year round

original: The smell is an acquired taste
translate: The smell is an acquired taste

original: The tongue and eyes of the redman swells grotesquely once it's pulled from the depth in which it dwells
translate: The tongue and eyes of the redman swells grotesquely once it's pulled from the depth in which it dwells

original: Despite its apperance, however, its flesh is considered a delicacy when served baked with lemons and vegetables
translate: Despite its appearance, however, its flesh is considered a delicacy when served baked with lemons and vegetables

original: Dead fish eyes stare up at you
translate: Dead fish eyes stare up at you

original: Steel-Fin is a staple on dinner tables throughout the Outer Isles
translate: Steel-Fin is a staple on dinner tables throughout the Outer Isles

original: It's commonly eaten in hearthy stews with vegetables
translate: It's commonly eaten in hearty stews with vegetables

original: One of the greatest of the Gallian Miracles was the turning of deserts into the great rolling wheat fields that now constitute a large portion of the Heartland
translate: One of the greatest of the Gallian Miracles was the turning of deserts into the great rolling wheat fields that now constitute a large portion of the Heartland

original: From these flows countless tons of grain and rich white flour
translate: From these flows countless tons of grain and rich white flour

original: Pungent and full of flavor, this herb is most frequently used to enhance a variety of meals
translate: Pungent and full of flavour, this herb is most frequently used to enhance a variety of meals

original: Cured ham is found in the cellar of every well-to-do merchant and petty noble in the Empire
translate: Cured ham is found in the cellar of every well-to-do merchant and petty noble in the Empire

original: Sticky and sweet, this ingredient is often used by cooks to sweeten or preserve food, and is a staple in every mead-makers arsenal
translate: Sticky and sweet, this ingredient is often used by cooks to sweeten or preserve food, and is a staple in every mead-makers arsenal

original: It is even said to have curative properties when applied to infected wounds
translate: It is even said to have curative properties when applied to infected wounds

original: Beyond just the taste, leeks go a long way towards adding some color to the drab cuisine of the poor
translate: Beyond just the taste, leeks go a long way towards adding some colour to the drab cuisine of the poor

original: In the north, lemons are almost exclusively found on ships where they serve to protect the sailors from the terrible scurvy that prolonged idleness and sexual abstinence is known to cause
translate: In the north, lemons are almost exclusively found on ships where they serve to protect the sailors from the terrible scurvy that prolonged idleness and sexual abstinence is known to cause. So associated with seafaring are they: with sailors, seafood, and trade; that crews of the Empire who transport them are affectionately referred to as "lemon-eaters," or the shortened "limony," and by extension, any seaman

original: The crab flesh is coated in spiced butter before baking in the oven to perfection
translate: The crab flesh is coated in spiced butter before baking in the oven to perfection

translate: The nutty flavor of the wyrdloaf mixes wonderfully with the aromas of garlic to produce a meal fit for an emperor

original: Onions are easily grow, keep for long and go a long ways towards covering up the taste of half-spoiled fish or meat

original: Tender oysters coated in bread-crumbs and baked until just right
translate: Tender oysters coated in breadcrumbs and baked until just right

original: You just hope the oysters were fresh
translate: You just hope the oysters were fresh

translate: It is said that potatoes alone can nourish a man's body indefinitely

translate: The same cannot be said for his soul

translate: A thick, hearty stew of beef cooked in rich, Ombarian wine

original: Ah, the understated elegance of a cheese and fruit plate

translate: A delicious-looking plate of baked, white fish on a bed of vegetables seasoned with freshly squeezed lemon

translate: Preferably eaten with a mug of ale on the side

translate: It could do with a little salt and a squeeze of lemon

original: Just the way mothers all over the Empire would make it!

translate: Richly spiced meat roasted on skewers

original: The mushroom omelette tastes of the forest

translate: The roasted eel is seasoned with garlic and served with thickly-cut potato chips

original: A meal to put hair on your chest!

translate: Often added to meat dishes to boost nutrition, these tasty treats can be found growing on various trees and bushes throughout the Empire

translate: These earthy flavoured molluscs have been known to increase a person’s desire and sexual stamina

original: No wonder then that the courtiers and lay nobility of the Heartlands gorge themselves on this delicacy
translate: No wonder then that the courtiers and lay-nobility of the Heartlands gorge themselves on this delicacy

translate: Just remember to smell them before consumption

original: Eat it fresh, bake it in a pie or make brandy from it!
translate: The wood itself is prized for its properties among musicians, who can often be found playing in the taverns of villages with pear orchards

translate: As filling as it is boring

translate: As the Gallian Empire's preservative and seasoning of choice, it is no wonder that the Salt Merchant's Guild is both rich and very powerful

translate: Due to the intensive and costly procedure involved its purification, fine sugar is a rarity, its sweetness reserved only for the kitchens of noble and middle-class households where it is typically used as an ingredient in glorious pastries and confections

translate: A small brass badge belonging to a member of the glorious Imperial Sewer Patrol

original: As chitin dries it can be ground into powder, providing a potent alchemical ingredient

translate: A slimy, curved fang pulled from the mouth of some sort of overgrown monstrosity

original: The end is still incredibly sharp
translate: The end is still incredibly sharp

original: Not to be mistaken for their smaller and more edible counterparts
translate: Not to be mistaken for smaller and more edible eggs, as ingesting them can have... undesirable effects upon one's bowel movements

translate: In the right hands, however, they can be carefully prepared to form a potent alchemical ingredient

original: Called “the King of insects” due to its shimmering emerald scales
translate: Called the "King of insects,” due to its shimmering emerald scales

translate: Its royal title, however, does not keep it safe from the alchemists and artificers who consider it a prized reagent

original: Whilst this small insect is a popular alchemical ingredient, its fire-like sting makes it one of the Empire’s most hated pests
translate: Whilst this small insect is a popular alchemical ingredient, its fire-like sting makes it one of the Empire’s most hated pests

original: Often found growing on graves, the roots of this weed are believed to feed on the flesh of the dead
translate: Often found growing on graves, the roots of this weed are believed to feed on the flesh of the dead

original: For this reason it is despised by grave-keepers and much sought after by those who dabble in the arcane
translate: For this reason it is despised by gravekeepers and much sought after by those who dabble in the arcane

original: Still, the rarity of reptilians throughout the Empire’s inner cities means it should fetch a decent price

original: Believed to be at the core of all metals, this liquid element is a commodity amongst alchemists and is as fast working as it is toxic

original: A small pinkish mushroom that is sometimes found in caves
translate: A small pinkish mushroom that is sometimes found in caves

translate: Though eating it will cause acute vomiting, it is a valuable alchemical agent when used properly

original: The Glowman is so called for its faint bioluminescence
translate: The Glowman is so called for its faint bioluminescence

original: It grows naturally in damp cave-systems and it a commonly used alchemical ingredient
translate: It grows naturally in damp cave systems and it a commonly used alchemical ingredient

translate: Easily recognizable with its red cap and white spots, the Laughtercap is not to be ingested as it is said to cause hysterical laughter and odd visions

original: Many an apprentice alchemist has ignored this warning through the ages

translate: Whilst this jelly-like substance may look harmless, its properties have been known to create potions just as acidic as the creature it comes from

original: Do not, under any circumstances, ingest
translate: Do not, under any circumstances, ingest

translate: Rats are so ubiquitously despised throughout the Empire that certain merchants will pay a bounty for their tails

original: An aggressive mold known to eat almost any organic material it comes into contact with, this mold has cost more than a few citizens their cheese cellars
translate: An aggressive mould known to eat almost any organic material it comes into contact with, this mould has cost more than a few citizens their cheese cellars

translate: This rare, luminescent scale was likely taken from some sort of giant lizard or sea creature

translate: Whilst it is primarily used as an alchemical ingredient, its beauty makes it a popular ingredient amongst artisans on the Outer Isles

original: Typically given as a gift to those in grief

translate: It is said that if the plant is placed near your bed it will gorge on your despair, offering some slight respite

original: Unfortunately, the same cannot be said for the creature that spins it

original: A small collection of mismatched buttons
translate: A small collection of mismatched buttons

original: You can hear the sea in them
translate: You can hear the sea in them

original: A clay vessel commonly used to hold wine
translate: A clay vessel commonly used to hold wine

original: A vessel used by locals from which wine or ale is drunk
translate: A vessel used by locals from which wine or ale is drunk

original: A tool used by followers of the Imperial faith to prepare the dead for burial
translate: A tool used by followers of the Imperial faith to prepare the dead for burial

original: A small metal hook used by locals to catch a variety of fish
translate: A small metal hook used by locals to catch a variety of fish

original: A small bone or wood instrument
translate: A small bone or wood instrument

original: Though a good knife and fingers will suffice for most of the Empire's citizens, it simply will not do for a small select elite
translate: Though a good knife and fingers will suffice for most of the Empire's citizens, it simply will not do for a small select elite

original: A spherical piece of glass sometimes used by islanders/locals to create jewelry or fool children
translate: A spherical piece of glass sometimes used by islanders and locals to create jewellery or fool children

original: A beaten up and ugly, albeit well crafted, tin goblet
translate: A beaten up and ugly, albeit well crafted, tin goblet

original: A glass vessel half full of rich Ombarian ink
translate: A glass vessel half full of rich Ombarian ink

original: Likely used for the Empire's drink of choice
translate: Likely used for a citizen of the Empire's drink of choice

original: A cutting tool commonly used by local farmers to shear their meager flocks
translate: A cutting tool commonly used by local farmers to shear their meager flocks

original: A piece from a set of pieces belonging to the game “Lancers
translate: A piece from a set of pieces belonging to the game “Lancers

original: Commonly used by members of nobility to check their appearance, these handheld items are believed by some to be ‘mirrors to the soul’
translate: Commonly used by members of nobility to check their appearance, these handheld items are believed by some to be ‘reflections of the soul’

original: A pitcher used for serving drinks
translate: A pitcher used for serving drinks

original: A tin plate used for serving meals
translate: A tin plate used for serving meals

original: Finely spun cloth is difficult to produce and highly coveted among the tailors of the Heartlands
translate: Finely spun cloth is difficult to produce and highly coveted among the tailors of the Heartlands

original: Not as expensive as it's finer counterpart, but still a local commodity
translate: Not as expensive as its finer counterpart, but still a local commodity.

original: A common household item often found in dining areas
translate: A common household item often found in dining areas

original: A brass pin sometimes used by commonfolk to hold various garments in place
translate: A brass pin sometimes used by commonfolk to hold various garments in place

original: A small carving made from walrus teeth
translate: A small carving made from walrus tusks

original: An empty glass bottle that has taken on a green tint
translate: An empty glass bottle that has taken on a green tint

original: The exoskeleton of various sea creatures, these shells are sometimes used by locals to create jewelry
translate: The exoskeleton of various sea creatures, these shells are sometimes used by locals to create jewellery

original: A toy made from smooth yew, these doll’s are popular gifts given to local children
translate: A toy made from smooth yew, these dolls are popular gifts given to local children

original: A tool commonly used in the weaving of tapestries
translate: A tool commonly used in the weaving of tapestries

original: This one appears to be made from the wood of the Yew Trees often found in the Outer Isles
translate: This one appears to be made from the wood of the Yew Trees often found in the Outer Isles

original: You wonder how many fortunes have fallen prey to its faded numbers
translate: You wonder how many fortunes have fallen prey to its faded numbers

original: A popular writing tool made from the feather of a large bird
translate: A popular writing tool made from the strong flight feather of a large bird

original: This one appears to need sharpening
translate: This one appears to need sharpening

original: A yarn of wool spun from the shag of the sturdy breed of goats that roam the hills in the Outer Isles
translate: A yarn of wool spun from the shag of the sturdy breed of goats that roam the hills in the Outer Isles
